condition.ab: Light brown papyrus which is darkly discolored in places. Written with a thin pen in dark black ink perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. The ink has faded in many places. The original cutting lines have been preserved on all four sides. The top left corner is broken off and several large holes in the papyrus have made much of the text difficult to read and interpret.
